issue.title: Frequent escalate to SIGKILL on shutdown

content.raw:
Yesterday Nate and I did a little testing that suggests that there's something not quite right in the signal handling among `gazebo` (the parent process) and `gzserver`/`gzclient` (children that are forked and exec()ed).

So the problem might actually be in Gazebo.
